0.5.name: wordpress/media-custom-fields
0.5.description: Media custom fields is a plugin which enables you to add custom data to your media, much like you can with custom fields in regular posts. You can now add data like "Photographer", "Date Taken", "Photographer Website" very easily, and you can manage your custom fields using a simple, but efficient interface.
